The company grew out of a non-proﬁt community initiative that the founders established after they discovered how expensive and confusing it was to get solar for the homes. By the time they had organised the installation of 220 solar PV installations in their small regional Queensland community, it was clear they had hit on a gap in the market. With the support of a Social Enterprise Fellowship from RMIT University, they set up as a company to challenge the current, sometimes dubious, ways solar companies were operating.

name: B'more Organic
description: B'more Organic translated their passion for healthy living, fundraising, and environmental stewardship into a business selling easy-to-consume, great-tasting organic foods that are the perfect proportion of protein to carbohydrates.

name: Imperative
description: designs products, strategies, and experiences to help organizations and communities measure and manage what matters including well-being, social, and cultural capital. We employ our own brand of design thinking and community organizing to create industry-defining impact, change strategy, and innovative technology. We are passionate about and committed to building learning organizations. Imperative exists in three integrated parts:

name: Griswold and Griswold Insurance Agency
description: Insurance brokerage Griswold & Griswold, founded in 1948, specializes in business and professional services insurance including medical/dental practices, veterinary practices, banking and financial companies, nonprofits, associations, and entertainment production studios. Griswold & Griswold provides industry-specific policies such as professional liability, commercial property and auto, as well as worker’s compensation and employee group benefits. A family-owned company, its commitment to community service, client satisfaction, independence and integrity has made Griswold & Griswold a trusted name for more than 60 years and the recipient of multiple awards from civic and professional organizations.

name: Paintbox Catering and Bistro Inc.
description: Paintbox Bistro and Catering was recently certified as a B Corp!

name: Yummari
description: Yummari is a family-owned, family-run company that specializes in creating healthy, minimally processed snacks and food products while putting a creative and nutritious spin on household staples such as energy bars and peanut butter. Husband-and-wife team Jason and Catherine Walsh started Yummari with the mission of making gluten-free, vegan, Non-GMO products with clean ingredient lists. Their first product lines focus on the Central American ancient food nutritional powerhouse: the chia seed.  Their vision was to create versatile and satisfying superfood products that people would incorporate into their daily eating habits when they were either training for a marathon or running errands on a busy afternoon.

name: S.W. Basics
description: S.W. Basics has a guiding principle: “Simplicity is the essence of awesome.” That doesn't just mean they leave crazy synthetic chemicals out of their truly all-natural, sustainable skincare products; it also means they forego trendy, exotic botanicals and luxury fillers. Instead, they use the fewest possible ingredients while still creating powerfully effective skincare. S.W. Basics products are made simpler for a reason: fewer ingredients means a smaller overall environmental impact, higher potency, and less chance for irritation, which is why they're so awesome even on super-sensitive skin.

name: New Seasons Market
description: Founded in 2000, New Seasons Market is proud to be homegrown and locally owned, currently operating 13 stores in the Portland-Vancouver area, with three more opening soon. Since the day they welcomed the first customer through their doors, New Seasons Market’s goal was to build community, champion the regional food economy, and be sustainable to the core by keeping their footprint small and gentle on the earth.

name: La Tercera Mirada
description: La Tercera Mirada helps organizations with social and environmental values to boost their strategies from a third point of view to determine what their room for improvement and growth can be.

name: Rimon, P.C.
description: Our clients, ranging from cutting edge technology startups to financial institutions and Fortune 500 companies, consistently receive exceptional representation across our 12 locations.

name: Whole Kids
description: Launched in 2005, Whole Kids is Australia’s leading organic food brand providing fun, yummy, healthy snacks for kids. Whole Kids offers a wide range of junk-free, additive-free and allergy-free organic snacks to nourish little one’s tummies.

name: Nutiva
description: Nutiva produces high quality organic superfoods and looks to promote the long-term sustainability and well-being of humanity. Nutiva was recently certified as a B Corp! Please check back soon for more information.

name: Dapwood Furniture Co.
description: Dapwood Furniture operates out of Albuquerque, New Mexico producing solid hardwood furniture using only natural materials and finishes. Their focus is on handicrafting high quality, safe bed frames and tables that will last customers a lifetime. Dapwood Furniture was recently certified as a B Corp! Please check back soon for more information.

name: Clark-Theders Insurance Agency, Inc.
description: Clark-Theders Insurance Agency was recently certified as a B Corp! Clark-Theders provides insurance coverage to businesses and individuals alike. Their clients range from small, family owned businesses to billion dollar corporations across many industries. Clark-Theders' hands-on, ethical business practices are rooted in their strong Christian values. Check back soon for Clark-Theders' updated profile, or visit their website for more information.

name: Seven25
description: was recently certified as a B Corporation! Seven25 is a multidisciplinary design consultancy for nonprofit and cultural organisations. Check back soon for Seven25's updated profile, or visit their website for further information.

name: Waste To Green, LLC
description: About Waste to Green

name: Ethical Electric
description: Ethical Electric is an energy company that does good. Ethical Electric powers as many American homes and businesses as possible with 100% clean energy from renewable sources like wind and solar. Ethical Electric use profits to fund causes that benefit our planet and advance equality, peace, justice and opportunity.

name: Selecta Auto Body
description: Selecta Auto Body is a recently Certified B Corp whose mission is to provide reputable, dependable and honest automotive collision repair service that emphasizes customer service with the highest priority. Please check back soon for a complete profile!

name: Pete & Gerry's Organics, LLC
description: Pete & Gerry's Organics was recently certified as a B Corp! Pete and Gerry's Organic Eggs is a real family farm. They've produced high-quality eggs for four generations in the heart of New Hampshire's White Mountains, and are committed to producing fresh, organic, cage-free, Omega-3 eggs from hens in a Certified Humane manner. This commitment remains unchanged as they continue to merge with other family farms. Pete and Gerry's is also committed to sustainable farming, with the goal of 100% sustainability. They're currently looking at several options for on-site energy production, including wind and solar power. They're also working toward becoming a zero-waste facility. Check back soon for Pete and Gerry's Organics' updated profile, or visit their website for more information.

name: Healthy Building Science
description: Healthy Building Science (HBS) is a professional service company with clients across the US. They offer a wide spectrum of services focusing on the built-environment: from design and construction consulting - to industrial hygiene and healthy building inspections. Focused on client satisfaction and pushing the sustainability envelope, HBS is on an upward trajectory.

name: Prairie Paper
description: Based in Winnipeg, this company is the industry leader in research, development and commercialization of tree-free pulp and paper. Phase one for the company is the manufacturing and importing of Step Forward Paper.  Phase two will include constructing a 100% tree-free, state-of-the-art, eco-mill in the Canadian prairies, where millions of tonnes of leftover straw are readily available.

name: Higher Legal
description: Higher Legal empowers victims of personal injury through innovations in transparency, education, advocacy, support and accountability within the legal profession with a goal of transforming tragedy into triumph.

name: Recollective Consulting
description: Recollective is a leading green building consulting firm focused on integrated design, LEED, Living Building Challenge and advanced building simulations. They have successfully completed over 30 LEED certifications, and are currently consulting on over 100 active LEED projects, amounting to over 25 million square feet.  Recollective facilitates the creation of a built environment that respects nature and enhances community. Their vision is to create a living built environment.

name: The Hub Australia
description: Hub Australia believes the world is not lacking in great ideas, but it is lacking the collaborative and supportive structures to help make them happen. That’s where they come in. Hub Australia is a national network of coworking spaces and learning communities driving innovation through collaboration.

name: Pymwymic
description: Pymwymic is the ‘Put Your Money Where Your Meaning Is Community’ of impact investors who believe in the flow of capital for good. Pymwymic is a membership of families, philanthropists and individual investors who support for-profit companies creating global solutions.

name: Enova
description: Enova is a social enterprise that designs, builds and operates 95 centers that offer access to education and technology based on the needs of low-income communities in Mexico. Their mission is to improve people’s academic and vocational skills through technology.

name: ArcTern Ventures
description: ArcTern Ventures (formerly the MaRS Cleantech Fund) is a privately-backed venture capital fund that provides early-stage capital to companies developing breakthrough ideas in the cleantech sector. The Fund has developed a unique early-stage investment model through its partnership with MaRS, one of the largest innovation centres in world.

name: Proyecto Importa
description: Proyecto Importa was recently certified as a B Corp! Proyecto Importa’s mission is to promote the inclusion of socially vulnerable individuals through the development of sustainable products and projects. Using technologies existing in the local market, they will restore basic human livelihoods that have been broken by discrimination and social exclusion.﻿ Check back soon for Proyecto Importa's updated profile, or visit their website for more information.

name: Ryan Nonprofits
description: Ryan Nonprofits provides strategic planning and consulting services to small nonprofits. A set of testimonials and sample client list can be found

name: Closed Loop Advisors
description: Businesses focused solely on profits without regard for people and the planet belong to a bygone era. Closed Loop Advisors helps organizations evolve by simplifying their transition to environmental and social sustainability while enhancing profitability.  This evolution is different for each organization. Closed Loop Advisors partners with their clients by offering a holistic set of services that includes detailed diagnosis of environmental performance, careful strategic planning, big data analytics, and project management or implementation advisory.

name: Summerhill
description: Summerhill is a leading Energy Efficiency and Product Stewardship services company specializing in consumer engagement. Since 2000, Summerhill has worked with industry, business, government, associations and NGOs to deliver meaningful consumer engagement programs for their customers in an effort to make significant positive environmental and business impact and affect consumer behavior change. As a knowledge and engagement leader for our clients, Summerhill provides unparalleled program management, key insights, and subject matter expertise in the areas of Energy Efficiency and Product Stewardship.

name: Kregel & Company CPA
description: Kregel & Company provides accounting and tax solutions to businesses that seek a different CPA experience. They are atypical accountants who focus on providing a stellar experience for their customers and solving real problems, instead of just pushing paper. They believe in the power of business to change lives for the better. Ultimately, the desire is to connect with a tribe of like-minded companies who see business with a purpose beyond profit and to provide those companies with the opportunity, peace of mind and inspiration to be successful.

name: Raffa PC
description: Since their inception in 1984 Raffa has had a way of doing business that many may have described as unconventional, certainly non-traditional, but it was a way of doing business that they believed would serve them best. They believed then, and even more so today, that being a good business means providing the highest level of services to their clients, being a conscientious and caring steward of both human and natural resources and a responsible corporate citizen.

name: Trum Handcycles
description: Trum manufactures three products geared towards helping those in wheelchairs enjoy the pleasure of biking. The first product is the 'Handcycle' device that transforms wheelchairs into bicycles. The second major product is the "Tricycle", a bicycle for seniors, allowing them to move in a safer way. Lastly, the "Everywhere" device attaches and enabled the wheelchair to gain mobility in adverse terrain, sand and swamps.

name: Compensation Venture Group, SPC
description: Compensation Venture Group (CVG) consults with companies to design and implement employee compensation programs that allow the company to recruit and engage the talent they need to execute on their purpose and mission. They design salary, cash incentive, equity, and other compensation programs that support company culture, strategy, and objectives.

name: Cloud for Good
description: With hundreds of custom Salesforce implementations, Cloud for Good is the leading Salesforce consulting partner for nonprofit and educational organizations.

name: Toniic
description: Toniic, an international impact investor network, works to promote a sustainable global economy through investments in enterpries, entrepreneurs, and funds aiming to change the world for the better. Toniic was recently certified as a B Corp! Please check back soon for more information.

name: Hawaiian Legacy Hardwoods
description: Hawaiian Legacy Hardwoods (HLH) has found a way to occupy the sweet spot where “doing good” meets “doing well” by planting rare high value endemic koa trees on Hawaii Island. Some trees are planted for investors for eventual harvest, while others—“Legacy Trees”—are planted to permanently reforest the land, sequester carbon, advance science and inspire environmental awareness.  The “For Harvest” model has many supporters, and for good reason. The consumption rates of tropical hardwoods has multiplied nearly 25 times in the last four decades. This rate is even more dramatic here in Hawaii where dwindling supplies have pushed koa prices up more than 1000% in the last 10 years alone, making it one of the most valuable woods on planet Earth.

name: Teak Media + Communication
description: Teak Media + Communication is an award-winning, values-led public relations and communication firm that increases awareness and drives public engagement for nonprofit organizations and responsible companies. Teak promotes the programs, products and services of organizations and companies that inspire human greatness and make the world a better place. The passion and energy Teak brings to its work set the company apart. The results it achieves generate revenue for clients.

name: North Berkeley Investment Partners
description: North Berkeley Investment Partners is an independent investment advisory firm whose mission is to help clients feel comfortable and confident in the decisions they make to reach their life goals. They offer comprehensive financial planning and investment management for a small group of clients who want comprehensive help with most financial aspects of their lives and a long relationship with someone who ‘gets’ the whole picture.

name: True Impact
description: True Impact LLC provides web-based software and support services to help organizations measure the social, financial, and environmental impact and ROI of their community investment, environmental, human resource, and other corporate citizenship activities. True Impact's online tools and support services measure your community involvement, sustainability, and other corporate social responsibility (CSR) practices to prove value, guide investment, and increase return on investment

name: Buy The Change
description: Buy The Change serves as a bridge between talented, industrious women artisans in the developing world and the American marketplace. With access to an expanded customer base, struggling artisans can grow businesses and have access to income not otherwise available.  BTC works with NGO’s and small craft co-operatives throughout the developing world to source fairly traded, woman made accessories, jewelry and home décor products, many of which are made from ecofriendly, up-cycled materials.  By donating 10% of sales to non-profit organizations, BTC supports social change both locally and internationally.

name: Encore Wealth Advisors
description: In 2012, Mark Stempel awoke to the fact that the global economy was ravaging our planet and triggering a Critical Mass of complex, interrelated environmental, economic, social and political crises.  Up until that time he had been a successful wealth manager, managing client portfolios for competitive financial returns as well as helping clients to engage in strategic philanthropy.  He realized that this approach was insufficient to deal with the social and environmental challenges that we faced and sold his wealth management firm so that he could make himself available to address the social and environmental crises we faced.

name: West Paw Design
description: West Paw Design is a US manufacturer of eco-friendly and high-quality products for dogs and cats. Distinguished by a commitment to create pet products in an environmentally-conscious way, West Paw Design’s team of 70+ employees are extremely proud that 100% of the products are manufactured in the United States – a characteristic that sets the company apart from a competitive field that largely outsources overseas. These hard-working and devoted employees are more like family, who not only take pride in what they do, but also greatly care for one another.

name: Blue Earth Consultants, LLC
description: Founded in 2005 by Dr. Tegan Churcher Hoffmann, Blue Earth Consultants, LLC is a boutique consulting firm with a portfolio of over 100 projects completed for a multitude of clients in the United States and internationally. Blue Earth Consultants specializes in developing sustainable solutions to complex, multi-faceted marine and terrestrial issues. The firm works with communities, businesses, non-governmental organizations, academic institutions, and governments to provide the best ideas and consulting services that help improve resource management and sustainable practices around the world.

name: New Day Films, Inc.
description: New Day Films is a unique, filmmaker-run distribution company, providing award-winning films to educators, community groups, government agencies, public libraries and businesses since 1971. Democratically run by more than 150 filmmaker members, New Day delivers hundreds of titles that illuminate, challenge and inspire. New Day was initially formed because the women's movement had arrived and a group of independent filmmakers were unable to find a distributor for their feminist films—so they decided to create one. Today, New Day members sustain the ideals that inspired the company's formation in 1971 - partnership, great stories and changing the world - and curate its collection to encompass a wide range of subject areas.

name: Kiej de los Bosques, S.A.
description: Kiej de los Bosques S.A. is a socially conscious enterprise that designs, develops and sells handmade fashion accessories. Its mission is to generate income for rural artisans that, despite having great knowledge and potential, are disconnected from markets.

name: Acorn Sign Graphics
description: Acorn Sign Graphics designs and fabricates custom architectural signage and graphics customers can depend on to be found, be seen, and be remembered. From award-winning design to sustainable sign and graphic solutions, eco-friendly sign manufacturing to long-lasting installations, Acorn Sign Graphics delivers comprehensive sign services to meet the needs of clients worldwide.

name: Pots n Pans
description: Pots ‘n Pans (PnP) is a fine-dining, social enterprise restaurant based in Hanoi, Vietnam.  Conceived in early 2012, PnP provides management, leadership and hospitality training to disadvantaged young people.

name: Ethical Markets Media, LLC
description: With over 40 years of foresight, insight and integrity in their leadership, Ethical Markets® Media (USA and Brazil) works to reform markets and metrics and grow the green economy worldwide, providing news and perspective with the

name: Impact Investment Group
description: The Impact Investment Group (IIG) is a private investment and advisory firm with a focus upon identifying investment opportunities in properties and businesses that will create measurable social and environmental benefits in addition to generating commercial returns.  Alongside investors, IIG co-invests in each deal and assumes an active role in the realisation of positive impact in collaboration with stakeholders.  With this commitment to delivering blended value, IIG measures not only financial performance, but social and environmental impact and transparently reports progress and results to investors.

name: One Stone
description: One Stone is a global sustainability advisory firm specializing in strategy and communication. Its aim is to deliver excellence, sustainable business value, and real change by helping companies transform their challenges into opportunity.

name: Ecologic Designs Inc. / Green Guru
description: Ecologic Designs works with organizations to manufacture OEM, Private Label and Co-Branded consumer products made from their waste materials or materials they’ve previously reclaimed. This process of “upcycling” reduces landfill waste and creates valuable eco-friendly products worthy of conversation about resourcefulness. Working with the customer closely, Ecologic Designs is able to help companies have a triple bottom line approach to their marketing and promotional product purchases.

name: Strateco Partners
description: A paradigm shift is taking place in business where the rules for succeeding have fundamentally changed.  Extensive research has proven that the traditional stockholder biased business model, where profit is pursued at the expense of people and planet, is an inferior generator of value.

name: OMBE
description: OMBE is an integrative health center located Boston's Back Bay neighborhood. The eco-friendly center sits above the historic Copley Square area of Boston with beautiful views of the square and surrounding architecture. Services include acupuncture, chiropractic, massage, naturopathy, nutrition, personal training, physical therapy, Pilates, and yoga. Small group classes limited to six individuals ensure that each individual receives the one-to-one attention that they deserve. Classes include ballet barre, meditation, Pilates, and yoga.

name: RosettaBooks
description: RosettaBooks is the leading independent digital publisher, annually selling over 1,000,000 eBooks worldwide.

name: Blue Dot Advocates
description: Blue Dot Advocates' practice areas cover all phases of an organization’s life: from start-up financing and formation all the way through to the negotiation and execution of acquisitions and mergers.  As business lawyers, they always keep the broader business context in perspective, while providing responsive, sensible advice that meets their clients’ deadlines. Blue Dot Advocates has a rich history representing companies of all sizes from a broad cross-section of industries. They are particularly inspired by organizations with entrepreneurial approaches to challenges such as poverty and climate change, and they applaud companies that are working to responsibly manage their environmental impact and human resources. Blue Dot Advocates was recently certified as a B Corp! Check back soon for an updated profile or check out Blue Dot Advocates' website.

name: Maria Farinha Filmes
description: Maria Farinha Filmes works primarily on social and environmental films. For example, their film Way Beyond Weight (2012) deals with childhood obesity. This issue afflicts over 30% of the infant population in Brazil. The film was made available online and reached over one million viewers, besides being utilized to coach Brazilian heath and educational professionals. Maria Farinha Filmes also has other projects that involve research in children play, Brazilian culture, and activism that are being produced for TV, cinema and the Internet.

name: ChicoBag Company
description: ChicoBag is on a mission to help humanity bag the single use habit. The wasteful, throwaway habit that overflows our landfills and clogs our oceans. They do this by advocating for waste reduction, and designing an unforgettable collection of high-quality, long-lasting reusable bags.

name: Gelfand Partners Architects
description: Gelfand Partners is a woman-owned, full service San Francisco design firm. The office advances the design of schools, affordable housing and civic facilities and extends the benefits of sustainability for budget sensitive clients. Through responsive design, social engagement and adaptive reuse of historic buildings Gelfand Partners’ practice reinforces the strengths of mature communities and enables and stimulates a healthy future for new communities.

name: The Eco Laundry Company
description: The Eco Laundry Company was born from the philosophy that an industry widely known to be environmentally destructive could be changed into one that is sustainable. The company’s aim is to demonstrate that sustainability and profit can go hand in hand and push forward the new paradigm of conscious capitalism that they like to call “Happytalism”.

name: Henley Club
description: The Henley Club is a private social club based in Melbourne, Australia. Our members are selected from diverse backgrounds and represent the future of Australian leadership. Members are connected through other members to all of the major clubs, groups and associations around the world.

name: Impact First Investments
description: Impact First Investments is the first Israeli investment management firm specifically designed to leverage local innovation to create globally scalable social and environmental impact.  In order to realize this objective, the firm is aggregating tradition investment and philanthropic capital to provide early-stage financing for viable and socially driven technology companies.  Due to the stage, for-profit nature, and primary social motivation of its portfolio, the firm primarily invests in companies that would not be established, stabilized, or reach their intended markets without its financing and contribution.

name: Top Drawer Creative Inc.
description: Top Drawer Creative was founded to practice the art of influence for social good. They understand that influencing the way people think and feel through brand experience is where the future of consumer engagement lies. They are a socially and environmentally conscious company that strives to influence change for the better. Being passionate and honest in their approach is part of their commitment to like-minded clients such as fellow B Corp companies Bullfrog Power and Genuine Health.

name: New Leaf Community Markets
description: New Leaf Community Markets has been a purveyor of goodness since 1985. Founded in 1985, the stores’ mission, to nourish and sustain their community, is reflected in the 10% of profits given annually to support local non-profits working to improve the quality of life. New Leaf is committed to offering customers food and lifestyle choices that have the most beneficial impact on their health, and the health of the environment. Helping customers make informed decisions is an integral part of this commitment.

name: Investeco Capital
description: Formed in 1999, Investeco was Canada’s first environmental private equity manager, and now manages four environmentally-focussed private equity funds. These funds specialize in companies in sectors such as cleantech, sustainable agriculture and the bioeconomy. By investing in these sectors the funds are able to tap into the growing demand for environmentally superior products and services while helping mitigate environmental degradation.

name: Equity By Design
description: Equity By Design is a business consultancy that “accounts for what matters.” They are committed to the growth and empowerment of entrepreneurs and small business owners and aim to promote peace through financial sustainability.

name: Simply Straws
description: Simply Straws is a reusable glass drinking straw alternative to the common plastic straws polluted ever second. This concept was born when founder, Cyndi Sladics, was looking for a solution for her dental patients. She knew straws help protect our teeth from the acids in drinks that cause teeth sensitivity, staining and erosion. She also knew the plastic straws leached chemicals mimicking hormones that disrupt our system, in addition to living in landfills for a thousand years. With a passion to educate the public on the effects of plastic pollution, and a commitment to work with organizations to minimize them - they began. They set out a mission to reduce the 500 million plastic straws disposed daily in USA!

name: Social Good Network
description: Social Good Network works at the confluence of cause and commerce, using its innovative software to create and measure the success of digital cause marketing campaigns for brands.

name: FlowOver
description: FlowOver brings Crowdfunding and Ecommerce together in a way so that everyone wins. FlowOver sites sell brand name products at the lowest prices online and also allow customers to donate 10% of their purchase price to the relief project of their choice.

name: Onda Organica
description: Onda Orgánica offers clothes made with organic cotton and fair work conditions in the Cordoba province of Argentina. Through their garments, the brand seeks to create awareness about the environmental and social situation in Argentina and to offer an ethical consumerism option. The use of organic cotton in garments avoids not only environmental contamination, but also water pollution. Onda Orgánica also cares about the health of workers and families that live near the crops.

name: Aoka
description: Aoka connects people. They believe in the power of socio-cultural contact, both for perceiving other ways of thinking and for self-knowledge.

name: Beau's All Natural Brewing Co.
description: Beau’s All Natural Brewing was started in 2006 by father and son, Tim and Steve Beauchesne. The family-run brewery takes pride in creating unique, wonderful, and certified organic craft beer, conceived with honest consideration for the environment and local communities, and delivered with a sense of friendly relationship. Beau’s All Natural makes a variety of world-class, award-winning craft beer, including its flagship, Lug Tread Lagered Ale, using certified organic ingredients and local spring water.

name: The Ariel Group LLC
description: The Ariel Group LLC is an international training and coaching firm comprised of performing artists and business professionals who believe the workplace functions better when people interact generously and communicate well.

name: Newstart Canada
description: Newstart Canada was created as a boutique lender in response to the needs of a growing segment of Canadians who require a vehicle loan, but have been turned down by regular financial institutions because of poor or damaged credit. Newstart Canada is an auto-leasing and finance company committed to delivering cars and credit to this large segment of Canadians.

name: GrantBook
description: GrantBook is a social purpose business specializing in the procurement and implementation of cloud-based tools that help grantmakers and their networks to maintain a more social and technology-enabled workplace. GrantBook offers expertise and proactive support as its clients take the important steps to transition some or all of their operations to the cloud. The team curates lightweight and continuously updated technology solutions to advance collaboration, grants management, and knowledge-sharing.

name: Neil Kelly Company
description: Neil Kelly started in business in 1947. Over decades, Neil, his son Tom Kelly, and a team of dedicated employees built the business into the Northwest’s largest residential remodeling company, with an emphasis on sustainability.

name: Ecoservice
description: Ecoservice operates in construction. Their goal is to be a benchmark in sustainable products, systems and services for the building industry. Their mission is to improve people's quality of life and interaction with the environment through the reduction of waste, the rational use of natural resources and the increased disposable income gained by reducing energy and water consumption.  To reduce the environmental impact and carbon emissions involved in all stages of construction, including the stage of use, Ecoservice commercializes: Solar heating systems; Rain water harvesting systems; Photovoltaic Solar power generation systems; Green roof systems, Green Walls and

name: Organik SEO
description: In 2009, Julien Brandt founded Organik SEO. Online marketing and social media were all the buzz and businesses were looking for guidance on how to navigate this new frontier. Julien decided to combine his passion for online marketing with his desire to help others. He wanted to set Organik SEO apart from the other online marketing companies that were sprouting up left and right. Having been raised with a love for environmental awareness and sustainability, he decided to incorporate this passion for sustainability with his passion for helping businesses with their online marketing. Over the next few years, Julien cultivated a small team of professionals that take a hands on, holistic approach towards building and managing local SEO and Social Media campaigns for small to mid-size local businesses.

name: Tony's Chocolonely
description: Tony's Chocolonely is a 100% slavery free chocolate chain. They are crazy about chocolate and serious about people, purchasing their cocoa directly from farmers in Ghana and Ivory Coast.

name: Immix Law Group PC
description: Immix Law Group exists to serve its clients’ legal needs, while never forgetting the business reality faced by each client served. The team is made up of attorneys who also have substantial non-legal business experience, and who know first hand what it is like to be a consumer of legal services. Their team consists of entrepreneurs, business owners, former high level executives, former marketing managers, and former creative services providers.

name: Traction on Demand
description: Traction is a CRM consulting and software development firm with unparalleled expertise in Salesforce.com implementations, data quality and marketing automation. Traction streamlines business processes by bending cloud-based technologies around business users. The enemy is redundancy. The results: Traction removes barriers to success and ultimately increases customers’ bottom line through sales, marketing, services and operational alignment.

name: OpenConcept Consulting Inc.
description: OpenConcept believes that social change requires new forms of collaboration and effective use of the Internet. By working with open source software communities, OpenConcept is effecting change. By leveraging Drupal, they are delivering secure, accessible, responsive and interactive web sites for their clients. OpenConcept Consulting can deliver high caliber community engagement tools at an affordable price.

name: Dhana Inc.
description: Founded in 2008, Dhana™ is an award-winning lifestyle Earth-conscious brand celebrating their global connections with the world. Dhana™ designs kids’ clothing influenced by and made with respect for global cultures and materials, reflecting the multicultural lifestyle and awareness of its founder, Shamini Dhana. Created by artists, inspired by nature, and sourced from around the world, the apparel reflects the lifestyle brand of the trendy, social conscious, environmentally savvy kid.

name: Bolsas Reutilizables
description: FER CREACIONES S.A. introduced the concept of reusable bags in Chile. They produce high quality reusable bags at competitive prices and are committed to socially and environmentally responsible production.

name: Novex Delivery Solutions
description: Novex Delivery Solutions is a locally owned and operated company. They have been servicing the Vancouver's same-day delivery needs for over 30 years.  Novex is one of the largest local same-day courier and freight providers in Vancouver making over 1800 deliveries per day with nearly 100 delivery vehicles. The Novex team is comprised of an experienced team of dispatchers, customer service representatives and drivers that operates a diverse fleet of vehicles. For over 10 years, they have integrated sustainable business practices into their organization. Over the years, their vision has evolved to reflect changes in the community and in the environment. Sustainability resonates throughout every level of their organization from drivers, office staff, to management. It has become more than their competitive advantage in the marketplace; sustainability has become their identity. They have a number of environmental programs and initiatives that drives their commitment in becoming a leader in the industry.

name: Good Clean Love
description: Good Clean Love manufactures premium certified organic and all natural intimacy products consistent with their mission to increase the awareness and experience of love on the planet. Expanding the quantity and enhancing the quality of loving relationships on our planet drives our devotion to create the healthiest and most effective products on the market. Good Clean Love believes that our mission of love dictates that everyone wins through our actions- from the employees who make it all possible, to the environment which we all need to protect to the community we live in. We measure our successes by the health and well-being of all these constituents.

name: Alma Natura
description: Alma Natura’s story begins in 1997, when it began offering services in the socio-environmental, cultural, and educational fields. Its first steps were as a nonprofit, though today it is organized as a Limited Partnership. The company operates from a small town in Sierra de Huelva and from there maintains deep relationships with clients, brands, and individuals dedicated to a different way of doing business, one that is more sustainable, ethical, and transparent. It is driven by the rural communities that it is a part of, but operates around the world in the pursuit of a more just society.

name: Advance Humanity
description: Advance Humanity empowers everyday humanitarians worldwide by providing an online Community, Fellowships and an Accelerator to take nonprofits and social businesses to the next level. The online community includes resources such as interviews, articles, webinars and much more to help Everyday Humanitarians change themselves and change the world. Fellowships include consulting assignments with nonprofits overseas, social businesses here in the U.S., and a wide range of volunteer opportunities from Peace Corps to grassroots Community projects.

name: Maseco
description: MASECO Private Wealth’s aim is to give peace of mind to globally minded US families by providing expert guidance on how to simplify their cross-border wealth management needs. MASECO serves and cares for Americans living at home or abroad through the planning and implementation of rational, practical and tax efficient wealth management strategies.

name: Reciclarg S.A.
description: Reciclarg SA's business model is based on the following pillars:

name: Out of the Box Collective
description: Out Of The Box Collective is an online farm to table home delivery service based in Los Angeles, delivering a full range of organic and sustainably produced food and wine direct to customers’ doorsteps -- via its own delivery van and via Amazon Fresh.  The company offers customers the convenience of set boxes including all the ingredients for up to a week’s worth of meals, accompanied by chef-created recipes to support them in the kitchen.  Additionally, customers have the flexibility to create their own boxes.  In parallel, Out of the Box has a separate storefront for mail order nationwide, delivering shelf-stable artisan-made pantry items.

name: UTOPIES
description: Utopies turned 20 years old in 2013 and employs 20 people. Their mission is to change business in order to change the world, and they want to accelerate change by helping companies turn difficulties and externalities into opportunities.

name: Vermont Creamery
description: For 30 years, Bob Reese, Allison Hooper and their team of 45 Vermonters have been creating new cheeses, like Bonne Bouche and Cremont, as well as continuing the tradition of fresh chèvre, that was the start of Vermont Creamery. Setting the pace for artisan craftsmanship, Vermont Creamery has been a pioneer in bringing American Artisan cheeses to restaurants and homes.

name: csr eco solutions
description: Csr eco solutions facilitates the redistribution of redundant assets on behalf of corporations, government institutions and healthcare facilities.  Their programs unlock the value trapped within no longer needed corporate and facilities assets and delivers the social and environmental value back to the community.  The csr eco solutions mandate is to reduce waste by donating surplus furniture, equipment, and supplies to charities, schools, and non-profits.

name: RedShip LLC
description: RedShip.com offers college care package subscriptions that are tailored monthly to fit a student’s changing moods and activities at different times throughout the school year. RedShip allows parents to support their college student with what they need, when they need it, in a way that can’t be ignored. The subscriptions allow parents to order once and know that their student is taken care of year round. RedShip’s ongoing research, student engagement, and customer feedback ensure that each package is crafted to answer the needs of the student at the time of delivery. All packages ship in a giant red cylinder designed to create a meaningful experience from the moment the student sees it in the mailroom.

name: Bridgetown Natural Foods
description: Bridgetown Natural Foods, established in Portland, Oregon in March 2010, is a manufacturing partner for leading all-natural, organic and gluten-free snack brands dedicated to producing sustainable, innovative and healthy products.

name: dutch
description: Dutch Group provides project management and program management with the aim to build better businesses for every stakeholder involved. With entrepreneurship embedded in the company’s DNA, Dutch Group connects the vision of entrepreneurs with the success and impact they aim to achieve. Working as a partner of entrepreneurs, Dutch Group is committed to the result. Dutch Group demonstrates this commitment by participating in the risks and results of every project. Dutch Group adds value by assisting companies to innovate, grow and enlarge their impact: social, ecologic and economic

name: BBoards.org
description: With little staff, tight budgets, and so little innovation focused on the needs of small groups around the globe, its getting harder for nonprofits and local groups to keep up in the highly competitive and cluttered on line world.

name: ETAVENCA
description: ETAVENCA is dedicated to biotechnology projects associated with the design and development processes using biomass, to offer technology transfers as standardized products, under the Franchise model based on the principles of sustainable development.

name: BacTech Environmental Corporation
description: BacTech is an environmental technology company that applies naturally-occurring bacteria to remediate mine waste, also known as tailings.

name: MPOWERD, Inc.
description: Inspired by the 2010 earthquake in Haiti that left millions without power, MPOWERD Inc. was founded by a group of like-minded individuals in 2012 with a vision to “eradicate Energy Poverty through Solar Justice.” Headquartered in New York City, MPOWERD, a fast growing consumer products company, develops and manufactures brilliant, transformative clean energy products and solutions to light up and empower the lives of those living and playing off-the-grid the world over. As a Certified B Corp, MPOWERD does good by doing well, measuring success in terms of both financial performance and social impact (dual bottom line).

name: Lightspan Digital
description: Lightspan is a Digital Marketing company that helps companies spread their message, increase brand awareness, and get more visitors to their websites and stores.

name: Hopemakers
description: Hopemakers offers debt counseling and refinancing services for financially-excluded populations in Korea.  Sometimes through mismanagement, sometimes through no fault of their own, normal households can become financially delinquent.  The credit rating mechanism in Korea is unforgiving, and often the only credit available comes at a very high price from loan sharks.  It is a struggle just to pay back the interest.

name: Green Home
description: Green Home offers thousands of trusted products for home and business from compostable goods to organic mattresses and offers sound advice for living green every day. More than just about the environment – Green Home is about healthy simple choices. Every product is tagged with one or more top ten green attributes that include: Health Conscious, Organic, USA Made, Sustainable, Non-Toxic, Compostable, Energy Efficient, Water Conserving, Socially Conscious, and Recycled/Upcycled. The Green Home Team takes the time to listen to their customers’ needs and truly cares about the people and products they represent.

name: Graines de Changement
description: Graines de Changement turned 10 years old in 2014 and employs 3 people. They are positive but not naive, optimistic and activists, idealistic and pragmatic. Graines de Changement design and produce the ideas, tools, and templates that everyone needs to be an agent of change.

name: Fig Food Company, LLC
description: Fig Food specializes in soups that are 100% plant-based, certified organic, and kosher. The ingredients are real, made primarily of ingredients form North America. Fig Food Company also seeks to address three pressing issues Americans face today: healthy living, fossil fuel independence, and the reduction of greenhouse gases. Fig Food works towards a community learning together about the benefit of plant-based foods, where the fence between consumers and organic farmers is lifted with the exchange of ideas and goods.

name: Bull City Burger and Brewery
description: Bull City Burger and Brewery is a locally owned, independent restaurant and craft brewery located in downtown Durham, NC. Opened in March 2011, the restaurant serves lunch and dinner seven days per week with approximately 90 seats inside plus 50 seats of outside year round patio dining. The restaurant offers a family friendly atmosphere featuring a children’s play area, as well as a private meeting room for business gatherings, events and presentations all within full view of our own brewery.

name: Human Investing
description: Human Investing is an SEC Registered Investment Advisor headquartered in Portland Oregon.  They act as an investment consultant and planner to families, endowments, foundations and corporate entities.  Additionally, the firm acts as a corporate pension consultant and 401(k) plan investment fiduciary.  Human Investing chose to deviate from the standards of Wall Street and focus on their client’s reality in an intimate, transparent, effective and approachable way. Welcome to Human Investing.

name: Comparte
description: Comparte's Mission is to promote fair trade and high quality craftwork and food products from Chile, ensuring practices to preserve dignity for economically disadvantaged producers through education, support and connections that will increase their income and living conditions.

name: 4YOU2
description: 4YOU2 is a language school that operates in partnership with NGOs in peripheral regions. It pays a rent to the NGOs by using empty spaces, creating a source of revenue for these organizations that survive from donations. It relies solely on foreign teachers who come from all over the world as part of a social and voluntary exchange in which they teach English, live in the community, and learn about social entrepreneurship. Students, the base of the pyramid, pay the cheapest market price (R$69.00 per month with included materials), near their residence with only foreign teachers, who in addition to teaching a new language, broaden the worldview of the student and provide a cultural exchange for both parts involved.

name: Jim's Organic Coffee
description: In 1994, Jim Cannell started Jim's Organic Coffee where he was able to keep a sharp eye on the quality of his product. Jim’s passion for organic coffee comes from the real sense that we are all part of one ecosystem; and that the decisions we all make have effects on other places and people. They are all-organic, their roasting plant runs completely on renewable energy, and their electricity that is wind generated.

name: Coffee Enterprises
description: Coffee Enterprises advises clients on strategic opportunities and challenges within the industry and also acts as legal consultants to the coffee industry to provide litigation services. As business consultants, Coffee Enterprises has many resources: a team of professionals with practical manufacturing, marketing and new product development experience. Coffee Enterprises’ facility is fully equipped with physical and sensory testing and training capabilities, and a high tech comprehensive database system able to produce reports in great detail. They constantly travel and have visited over 120 coffee roasting plants and 19 producing countries. They are experienced experts in assessing coffee systems and identifying the strengths and weaknesses of top coffee companies worldwide.

name: Policlínica Granato
description: Policlínica Granato was created in 2008 with the goal of offering quality medical treatment and complementary exams, with flexible prices for people who do not have health insurance.

name: Revivn
description: Revivn is a social enterprise focused on the repurposing of used technology for social good and empowerment. Revivn uses outdated electronics from companies to build out various initiatives helping people gain computer access. By connecting companies to communities through social impact programs, Revivn helps raise awareness about the power of repurposing and impact technology can have for good.

name: Walden Hyde
description: Based in Boulder, Colorado, Walden Hyde is made up of anthropologists, storytellers, sustainability experts, and designers.

name: Tech Networks of Boston
description: Tech Networks is a Boston-based information services company who works collaboratively with mission-based organizations to enhance their effective use of information technology. TNB lives by the motto, “we’re better together.” Working together, Tech Networks can reduce the cost of an organization’s IT services while making life easier for end users. Because every budget is different, the TNB staff is trained to collaborate with a company’s staff to jointly provide the kind of support that an organization needs.

name: Capricorn Investment Group, Llc
description: Capricorn Investment Group was recently certified as a B Corp! Please check back soon for more information.

name: Schoolzilla Inc.
description: Schoolzilla is a data management platform that turns achievement and operational data into interactive reports.

name: DePaul Packaging
description: DePaul Industries is the Northwest's most comprehensive outsourcing specialist. For over 40 years, DePaul Industries has served some of America's best-run companies by providing flexible staffing, security, and packaging solutions to solve business problems.

name: Hilary's Eat Well
description: Hilary’s Eat Well is a real food manufacturing company in Kansas whose primary reason for being is to create products that make people feel good. Dedicated to nourishing bodies and the environment, only thoughtfully researched, non-GMO ingredients are used. The product offerings are free of common food allergens, easy to prepare at home, affordable to all and undeniably delicious! As an approachable, personable company, HEW is committed to forming long-lasting partnerships with suppliers, distributors and retailers.

name: COMBIO ENERGIA
description: They implement biomass boilers inside their clients’ facilities and manage the investments, operations, maintenance, and the sourcing of the biomass, leaving the client no financial or operational risks.

name: Social Impact Architects
description: Social Impact Architects® provides management and sector specific services to organizations that address society's most pressing challenges. They use innovative, market-driven management tools to design cost effective, pragmatic plans for their clients

name: Thread LLC
description: Thread takes trash from the streets of the developing world and converts it into dignified jobs and fabric, which they then sell to companies trying to improve their social and environmental impact.  It was born out of a journal entry in 2010 after the Haiti earthquake, "If Haiti can turn trash into money = good."

name: Algramo
description: Algramo works to reduce shopping prices for families in a sustainable and intelligent manner.

name: Eagle Cliff Partners
description: Eagle Cliff partners with exceptional people to build great businesses that contribute to a sustainable and prosperous future.

name: Community Natural Foods
description: Community Natural Foods is a natural and organic market located in Calgary, Alberta. A locally owned company, Community first opened its doors in 1977 as the city’s original health food market. Now with three full format grocery stores and partial ownership of the Kingsland Farmers’ Market, this thriving local business has become a staple for many Calgarians.

name: Shout
description: Shout is a mobile fundraising platform that is easy to use and allows people to support their favourite causes in a socially connected way.

name: PV Squared
description: PV Squared’s focus on solar energy, efficiency, and other forms of clean energy seeks to transform how energy is generated and used, enhancing a healthy natural environment. PV Squared’s partnering with architects and construction firms, developing solar energy systems for affordable housing, cohousing projects, assisted living centers and others will locally change and strengthen community ties. PV Squared’s organization as a cooperative with employee owners seeks to demonstrate to other businesses that workplace democracy and business responsibility will be an effective framework to enable atransition to a new, healthy economy.

name: Insight Robotics Limited
description: Insight Robotics was established in 2009 in Hong Kong by a team of seasoned businessmen and robotics technologists who share the common vision in “saving the world bit by bit, grid by grid”.  The team has been participating in frontline disaster relief operations globally and understands the pains of disaster victims. It believes robotics technologies can help mankind to reduce the magnitude of disasters and make better use of limited resources.  Insight Robotics provides an integrated platform “Insight Globe” for users to monitor and manage critical infrastructures and key resources.

name: Mindfull Investors
description: Mindfull Investors is a venture fund investing in the new breed of entrepreneurs creating disruptive, breakthrough companies that positively impact our health, our environment, and our healthy lifestyles. The Mindfull team sources and funds one of a kind companies, providing investors a compelling opportunity to generate outsized returns.

name: DoubleDividend
description: Investing is their Nature. DoubleDividend is a responsible investment manager that achieves performance with principles. The investment portfolios consist of great and responsible investment funds and companies. These companies are quality leaders in terms of sustainability, business model, balance sheet and track record. Moreover, they are attractively values thereby improving the risk-return profile of any investment portfolio.

name: Gary Community Investments
description: Gary Community Investments invests in for-profit and philanthropic solutions for Colorado’s low-income children and their families. It was founded by Denver oilman Sam Gary under the belief that business and philanthropy can— and should—work together to create opportunities for those who need it most.

name: Alkance Comunicaciones
description: Alkance Comunicaciones strives to be recognized as a PR agency that achieves the goals of their clients in both depth and scope. Their team members are experts and they are committed to the wellbeing of the community.

name: Alaska Glacial Mud Co.
description: Alaska Glacial Mud Co. sustainably hand-harvests raw glacial mineral mud from the vast Copper River Delta where timeless glaciers have ground remote mountains into pure mineral-rich powder. They manufacture a niche line of glacier derived spa therapy products for face and body for spa professionals and at-home use.

name: Veritable Vegetable
description: With forty years of leadership, Veritable Vegetable (VV) distributes high quality, organic produce to independent cooperatives, retailers, restaurants, schools, corporate campuses and wholesalers.  VV supports small to mid-sized organic growers by providing broader access to the marketplace and maximizing the return farmers receive for their product.  Based in San Francisco, their distribution area includes California, Arizona, Colorado, Hawaii, Nevada and New Mexico.

name: Flowing S.A.
description: Flowing wants a better world and works to achieve it. The company develops concrete proposals to help strengthen will power in every human being that will in turn allow them to change the level of stress, tiredness and chaos in their homes, schools, enterprises and society.

name: Teysha Social Enterprises
description: Teysha is a purpose driven company that works to connect communities and empower people to explore the world through art, community and craft. With indigenous and traditional communities, they work to connect people to authentic handmade art through collaboratively created, culturally charged footwear and goods. Every piece celebrates the world's art forms, cultivates global community and embraces the rich diversity of the planet. By wearing and supporting these art forms, people help to cultivate a world in which people have the opportunity to express themselves, work for a better future, and connect across borders and cultures.

name: 3vectores
description: 3vectores offers services that improve the design and impact of sustainable branding for companies, organizations, and products.

name: Rescue Chocolate
description: Rescue Chocolate presents a line of delicious dark chocolate bars and truffles that are vegan, kosher, handcrafted in Brooklyn, organic, and fairly traded. While the chocolate is only for humans to enjoy, of course, all profits are donated to animal rescue organizations. It is sold in gourmet groceries, gift boutiques, pet stores, veterinarian offices, and animal rescue storefronts, as well as online. Since the company’s founding in January 2010, Rescue Chocolate has helped hundreds of non-profit animal welfare groups to raise thousands of dollars for their lifesaving work.

name: Instituto Muda
description: Instituto Muda is a company conceived in 2007 which aims to lead sustainable solutions through waste management to high-rise condominiums in São Paulo, Brazil. Instituto Muda has already implemented the system in nearly 85 buildings, recycled 3,500 tons and more aware and trained more than 10,000 families. The organization delivers a customized and complete solution to condominiums and businesses through:

name: DOMI
description: DOMI was founded with a social & environmental mission by a team of seasoned entrepreneurs with backgrounds in technology, internet, economics, systems architecture, branding & PR.

name: Encanto Jewels
description: Based out of Grass Valley, California Encanto is an eco-friendly jewelry company specializing in Tagua pieces sustainably sourced from Colombia. Monica Farbiarz founded the company in 2007 to empower herself to become economically independent while creating an ethical, conscientious business. Encanto has recently become a member of the Fair Trade Federation and a B Corporation. After establishing a strong presence in the wholesale market for seven years, the company is expanding to retail to make the products more accessible.

name: ePantry
description: ePantry’s mission is to shrink the environmental footprint of the American household by making sustainable products the most convenient option for busy consumers. Instead of last minute runs to the corner store to restock toilet paper, laundry detergent, and shampoo, ePantry has created a platform that replaces those inconvenient errands with an app/service that's fun, economical and incredibly simple to manage. You receive your replacement product exactly when you're running low, ensuring that you never run out of the products you believe in and use every day.

name: Natural Organic Process Enterprises
description: Formed in 2009 Natural Organic Process Enterprises (NOPE) has established itself within a niche of the recycling industry. They aspire to promote composting in an effective and educational way to engage their local communities to be more sustainable. They feel that food scraps and the other organic components to the waste stream should be considered a natural resource that can be conserved through composting. A key component to their business model has been to “close the loop” through their Compost Credit Program.

name: Social Asset Measurements
description: Social Asset Measurements Inc. (SAM), incorporated in May 2011, is a consulting and software company that helps organizations measure, manage, and demonstrate their social impact. SAM has been twice-funded by the National Research Council of Canada via the Industrial Research Assistance Program for our work in developing the Social Return Intelligence Suite (SRI). The SRI provides on-demand reports for Social Return on Investment (SROI) and outcomes, hosts the largest global database of indicators and financial proxies (monetary approximations of the value created by interventions), and provides SROI and outcomes benchmarking. The company has developed core expertise in large-scale rigorous and credible frameworks that has been used for government reporting, financing, and internal stakeholder engagement (i.e. volunteers, staff, participants). Our clients are some of the country’s largest non-profit organizations and foundations.

name: Wellspring Consulting LLC
description: Wellspring Consulting works with the leadership of social sector organizations to set strategic direction, build organizational capacity, and address some of the most pressing issues in society. They achieve this through a remarkable team of strategists with talent in deep listening, rigorous analysis, thoughtful problem solving, and skillful group facilitation.

name: therethere
description: is about “pride of place.” That place where you feel connected—your hometown, new town, or anywhere your memories live. With the help of local artists, the company has worked to create expressions of the local everyday to help deepen your connections to this place. For each shirt that is purchased,

name: Brewery Vivant
description: Located in a former funeral home chapel in Grand Rapids, Michigan, Brewery Vivant specializes in Belgian and French inspired beers and fare. What makes Vivant unique is the way they approach their craft and operate their business. The core of Brewery Vivant can be found at the crossroads of three passions:

name: P.A.C.E. MD INTERNACIONAL S DE RL
description: PACE MD provides services and products that develop decentralized/community-based models of quality medical training. This strategy positively affects communities in Latin America by developing actionable qualities among health care providers and systems; SKILLS, KNOWLEDGE, and ABILITIES (SKA), thereby reinforcing the “Chain of Survival” and the quality of health care. PACE MD’s approach ensures the best possible outcomes for people experiencing emergency-specific and primary care related health conditions in underserved areas. In the next 3-5 years, PACE MD will increase the volume of health providers trained online and in-person, welcoming innovations that will improve the company’s ability to provide professional quality and value across Mexico and Latin America.

name: TedSarvata.com
description: As a successful executive of a purpose-driven company, you're working crazy hours and still facing a huge to-do list. Is this what you signed up for? If you could have more freedom and time, what would you do to maximize the impact of your business and your life?

name: Pangolin Associates
description: Pangolin Associates helps organizations achieve efficiencies and competitiveness through measuring and reducing energy, carbon and other environmental impacts.

name: Arcadia Power
description: Arcadia Power is the first nationwide Clean Energy utility option for individuals and small businesses. They provide customers 100% pollution-free energy via local utilities by partnering with wind and solar projects around the country.

name: Archi's Acres
description: Archi's Acres is a farming enterprise that utilizes hydro-organic technology to grow produce. Headquartered in Escondido, California, Archi's is a certified organic greenhouse operation, which grows living basil, kale, and other herbs and produce.

name: Smartrip
description: SmarTrip is a travel agency with a social focus. The company has a unique agreement with first-class hotels in Chile thats allow them to book their rooms at a great discount (40%-60% off). This is because 80% of the profits generated by Smartrip are donated to develop social programs for the communities surrounding the hotels, specifically through the SmarTrip Foundation that owns 80% of the company.

name: CardioReady
description: CardioReady’s offering is an end-to-end solution, spanning AED selection and procurement to training to ongoing management to post-event. We are a specialist exclusively focused on the AED sector, and maintain dedicated Practice Groups that provide us with a unique ability to understand our clients' business needs. They use a patented process to provide turn-key solutions to our clients, culminating in conferment of the CardioReady Certification. Designed to optimize lifesaving potential and efficacy, and coordinated via a dedicated Relationship Manager.

name: Armonia LLC
description: Armonia uses multiple forms of capital (financial, human, network, intangible) to support systemic shifts towards harmony. Their intention is to catalyze regeneration of soil, soul, and society. Armonia believes in seeding society with values of fundamental interconnection, well-being, and holism. Their work is to support and partner with visionaries who are implementing this viewpoint.

name: Centscere
description: Centscere empowers donors to give a few cents to their favorite cause every time they Tweet on Twitter, post on Facebook or click ‘Like’. In addition, Centscere offers analytic and digital marketing services for nonprofit organizations. The company operates from New York City, but funds projects worldwide.

name: Avante
description: Avante is an innovative financial solutions provider. It is the first Brazilian company to offer unbiased and transparent financial advice to the Base of the Pyramid (BoP), through a cost-free online and offline customized service. The purpose of Avante is to untangle the relationship between low-income communities and money, offering advice and suitable product recommendations according to clients’ needs, for example prepaid cards, credit alternatives and insurance.

name: The Natural Baby Company
description: The Natural Baby Company is a family-operated business that designs, manufacturers, and sells products that positively impact the health of young children and the global environment.  The company’s products are known for their high level of innovation and industry-best materials, a combination that leads to products that are extremely durable and user friendly.  The company’s major brands include award-winning GroVia® modern cloth diapers and OvoloWraps™, a new entrant in the babywearing market.

name: i.d.e.a.
description: i.d.e.a. is an award-winning integrated marketing company that moves people, products and culture through its nine core disciplines: strategy, creative, design, reputation, social media, digital, brand management, media and brand purpose. i.d.e.a. helps brands matter by creating right-sized ideas that live in all the places consumers play, and is dedicated to creating and delivering powerful ideas that are good for business and good for the world.

name: LIFT Economy
description: LIFT helps company leadership that is too head-down with day-to-day tasks to rise up and focus on structure and strategy, and helps them stick to the paths that will make them more successful and complete. They provide comprehensive business coaching and project consulting to lift organizations out of overwhelm and frustration, and into to focus, ease and results. LIFT wants to empower, support and invest in the leaders of the Next Economy to create resilient, sustainable, prosperous bio-regions.

name: MetaBrand Corp
description: MetaBrand is a flavor development house, formulation lab, and ingredient distributor in the Natural Products Industry.

name: Treedom
description: Treedom, founded in Tuscany in 2010, promotes agroforestry projects, in particular the planting of fruit trees, and offers innovative solutions for green branding, stakeholders engagement and sustainability strategies. The innovation consists of the transparency and visibility of the action. Once planted, every single tree is photographed, geo-localized, and posted on the user's profile, as well as always visible on the web and shareable on social networks.

name: Pro Bono Australia
description: Pro Bono Australia is a gateway to the Social Economy. They are an online hub - where Not for Profits, philanthropists, volunteers and sustainable business all converge and work together to drive positive environmental and social change.

name: The Rose Group
description: The Rose Group was launched in 2013 with one clear vision: to lower veteran unemployment and under-employment.  By shaking up the way veterans and employers meet, the Rose Group has done away with hiring conferences, job fairs, and large contingency fees and replaced them with sensible products, services that work and a more personal approach.

name: Currie Communications
description: Currie Communications is an independent Australian public relations agency which thrives on work that starts conversations about solving problems.

name: Vital Consult
description: Vital Consult is committed to corporate responsibility and sustainability, maintaining high standards of honest and ethical business practices at all times.

name: Education Changemakers
description: Education Changemakers (EC) was started by former teachers and principals who were consistently able to turn around incredibly challenging schools in Australia and Africa. EC was founded on a belief that the best solutions to ending education disadvantage came when teachers were able to stand up and propose answers to the realities that they were facing.

name: Global Policy Solutions
description: Global Policy Solutions is a mission-driven strategy firm dedicated to providing quality research, project management, and training services to corporations, philanthropy, and government agencies. The firm specializes in designing and implementing advocacy and cause-related marketing campaigns. Global Policy Solutions' nationally recognized initiatives have resulted in measurable and positive social change.

name: Carolyn Tate & Co.
description: Carolyn Tate & Co. is an education company dedicated to bringing consciousness to

name: SOCAR
description: SOCAR deploys networked cars in neighborhood for people to share a car when needed on a pay-per-use basis without other costs of ownership.

name: D-Orbit
description: D-Orbit develops smart satellite disposal systems (D-Orbit Decommissioning Devices, D3) that can be installed on spacecraft and launcher stages before launch and are able to remove them in a quick, safe and controlled manner from their orbit. The objective is to help operators saving their assets (i.e. orbital slots), reducing operational costs and risks, and consequently providing an easier, sustainable and profitable access to space.

name: Dadavan Systems
description: Data collection and analysis play a significant part in the planning and building of healthy and whole individuals and communities. Dadavan creates customizable data collection software for schools, communities and Indigenous peoples. Dadavan’s products translate data into community-generated knowledge that can be used to create positive impact through informed decision-making.

name: NuttZo
description: NuttZo is based in San Diego, California. Despite being a small company with thin margins, NuttZo has become a big player in the nut butter category. NuttZo is one of the highest quality, healthiest nut butters on the market – not only for consumers but for the environment, as well. Every decision and ingredient is consciously evaluated and has to pass the NuttZo ‘thumbs up’ test – Is it healthy? Does it feel good? Will it help and not hurt? Is it the best we can do? NuttZo selects only high quality, organic and non-GMO nuts and seeds; NuttZo never adds sugars, oils or fillers to its products; NuttZo chooses glass jars instead of plastic; NuttZo provides flexible work schedules to accommodate employees and their families; NuttZo encourages a ‘paper-free’ office; and NuttZo donate a portion of its sales to the nonprofit, Project Left Behind.

name: Jibu
description: Jibu equips new co-invested business owners with a proven, business-in-a-box franchise solution that incentivizes them to launch strategically located storefronts that can draw water from any local source, filter it on the spot using leading-edge ultra-filtration equipment and seal it in aspirational bottles.

name: ProQualitas
description: ProQualitas is a business consulting firm which specializes in providing assessments, consulting, and training in the field of human capital management. They offer simple and creative strategies that promote and enable high quality service experiences to companies that are facing new challenges.

name: Green City Growers
description: Green City Growers (GCG) transforms unused space into thriving urban farms, providing clients with immediate access to nutritious food, while revitalizing city landscapes and inspiring self-sufficiency.

name: KeepCup
description: KeepCup started in 2009 with a problem in a café – too many disposable cups. Every minute around the world over one million disposable cups are discarded to landfill. Existing reusable cups were too large to fit under the group heads of the machine and were at best utilitarian in appearance.

name: WorthWild LLC
description: WorthWild is a crowdfunding platform for environmental education, innovation, conservation, and recreation. Their mission is to make environmental progress and sustainability accessible to everyone through online storytelling, community building, business partnerships, and fundraising.

name: Artisan Connect
description: Artisan Connect provides market access for small-scale artisan groups in the developing world. They source ethically through artisan collectives and other organizations offering fair wages and social services to artisans tailored to local needs.

name: TripZero
description: TripZero enables customers to travel without creating a massive carbon footprint. When booking a hotel through TripZero, they calculate the carbon footprint created by the trip (including both transportation and hotel), and then they erase that footprint with carbon offsets. Sustain’s latex comes from a Fair Trade Certified, environmentally sustainable rubber tree plantation on the planet – meaning the health of the soil and biodiversity of the land are as safe as the people who work it.
