description: CAP Global is a wholly owned subsidiary of Napo Pharmaceuticals. Napo is committed to the development and commercialization of novel, branded pharmaceuticals to global populations through the establishment of local partnerships.

name: W.S. Badger Co, Inc.
description: Badger is a family run, family friendly business located on the banks of the Ashuelot River in rural Gilsum, New Hampshire, USA. The business was started back in 1995, in the kitchen of a carpenter who was in desperate need of relief for his rough, dry, cracked hands – the result of working daily in the unforgiving New Hampshire winter chill. Using Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Beeswax, Castor Oil, Aloe Vera and Essential Oil of Sweet Birch, a traditional New England herbal remedy, the original Healing Balm was born.

name: New Belgium Brewing Co, Inc.
description: At New Belgium Brewing we have long considered the environment, our community and our co-workers as integral shareholders. We recently became a 100% employee-owned company and we see becoming a Certified B Corp as going hand in hand with that ethos. Together, the two structures will allow us to maintain the utmost control over our vision and future.

name: Namaste Solar
description: Based in Colorado, Namasté Solar is an employee-owned cooperative that designs, installs, and maintains solar electric systems for homes, businesses, non-profits, and government entities. Since its inception in 2005, Namasté Solar has installed over 3,000 solar electric systems. Namasté Solar’s unique business model has garnered widespread recognition including a Outside Magazine “One of America’s Best Places to Work” (2013 & 2014),“Best for the World” designation from B Corporation (2012-2014), a “Top Small Company Workplace” award from Winning Workplaces (2011), a “Best Place to Work” award from the Boulder Chamber of Commerce (2010) and Denver Business Journal (2009), a #56 ranking on the “Inc. 500” (2009), and a “Most Democratic Workplace” listing from Worldblu (2010-2014).

name: Myplanet
description: build the right thing, fast. Myplanet empowers organizations with UX design & technology solutions to support the delivery of great web-based products. They believe firmly in the power of user-centered design, open source and agile principles.

name: Maxwell Health
description: Maxwell is the first company to pair the highest quality individual and family health plans in the country with world-class wellness services and technology. Your Maxwell membership includes medical and dental insurance, fitness and nutrition coaching, physician recommendations, claims advice, a health and fitness tracker, and a rewards program. You can depend on Maxwell to bring together all the resources you need to manage your health in one place, with round-the-clock professional support just an e-mail or phone call away.

name: Jitasa
description: Jitasa is the first and largest national accounting and bookkeeping services provider dedicated solely to the nonprofit sector.

name: In Posse
description: In Posse’s focus is not just on engineering building systems but also on engaging with building occupants. In Posse believes the path to the greatest energy savings and lowest environmental impact lies with people. The company seeks to help people better understand their relationship with energy and the environment and to design buildings that inspire and motive positive behavioral change.

name: Hybrytec Solar
description: The Change We Seek®

name: Greyston Bakery, Inc.
description: A storied social enterprise, Greyston Bakery has been baking gourmet brownies, cookies, and good will just north of New York City since 1982. The $10 million for-profit bakery is most famous for its long-standing status as Ben & Jerry's brownie supplier and for having an open-hiring policy that provides the people of Yonkers, NY with employment opportunity regardless of work history. Committed to a Triple Bottom Line, Greyston Bakery continues to be a pioneer in the world of social enterprise.

name: Greenerprinter
description: Greenerprinter is a certified green business that prints business cards, marketing collateral, product catalogs, retail packaging, banners, and more using recycled materials and soy & vegetable-based inks. With an easy-to-use online ordering system and more than 20 years of experience, Greenerprinter offers you a high-quality, responsible printing option.

name: Gray Ghost Ventures
description: Gray Ghost Ventures (GGV) is a Certified B Corporation impact investing advisory firm dedicated to providing market-based solutions to entrepreneurs who are addressing the needs of low-income communities in emerging markets. GGV focuses on serving these low-income communities in developing nations through for-profit investment in operating companies or investment funds, ecosystem development and capacity building.

name: Grassroots Capital Management PBC
description: Grassroots Capital is a leader in microfinance investment. The firm plays a pioneering role in attracting private capital into the industry, creating investment vehicles to address market gaps, and providing the necessary funding to support new and innovative as well as established and mature initiatives.

name: Goodmans Interior Structures
description: Goodmans Interior Structures is an office furniture dealership dedicated to creating great lifetime furniture experiences for their healthcare, corporate, education and government clients.  Who they are is a reflection of their work and the way they do it, their history and their values, and the ethic of innovation and design that is at the heart of it all.

name: Genuine Health
description: As pioneers in the industry, Genuine Health has been committed to quality and consciousness in every step of creating the highest quality natural supplements that promote health, beauty and performance from the beginning.  Starting with revolutionary formulations based on research proven ingredients, they design innovative products to deliver only the best in efficacy and safety.

name: Energy Opportunities
description: The Integrative Design Guide to Green Building: Redefining the Practice of Sustainability

name: Enrollment Resources Inc.
description: Enrollment Resources (ER) is a leading performance improvement company helping post-secondary schools increase their enrollment. Using logical, easy-to-follow tools and in-depth assessments of systems we help simplify marketing and admissions processes. Our purpose is to help get marketing away from guru’s, consultants, and media companies peddling the latest ‘big idea’, and give the hard- working people tasked with running schools, factual and reproducible systems that will improve their organization and, in turn, students' lives.

name: Eldot, LLC
description: Eldot, LLC is a bamboo product design firm and distributor. Their mission is to design, facilitate production, and distribute quality, sustainable home furnishing and architectural products to benefit the environment and its inhabitants. In order to be a catalyst for rural poverty alleviation and positive climate change, Eldot is committed to developing handmade, innovative bamboo based products for contemporary society. Their work is as much an industrial revolution as a social movement for a triple bottom line: People, Planet, and Profit.

name: thedatabank, gbc. (general benefit corporation)
description: thedatabank, inc. was founded in 1998, through the vision of its two founders, Chris Hanson and Mark Paquette. thedatabank's mission is to create positive social change through technology. They do this by providing high performance, easy to use, affordable software solutions to nonprofit organizations engaged in making the world a better place; and by providing a workplace that respects diversity, encourages innovation, and creates sustainable employment for the community. thedatabank's web-based nonprofit software is uniquely designed to help each of its clients develop and sustain long-term relationships with their supporters. By providing several database driven software packages, thedatabank can create an affordable, effective relationship management and communications system that meets each organization's needs.

name: Northeast Green Building Consulting, LLC
description: Northeast Green Building Consulting (NGBC) builds homes, advises and educates design teams, and verifies sustainable construction using a life-inspired process based on biomimicry, resilience science, building science and the sciences of the living world.

name: Nudge B.V.
description: Nudge connects people and organisations to realize bottom-up initiatives that bring positive and durable change to our society.

name: Ecojun Company
description: Ecojun company is a design company that develops and manufactures green design products based on environmental ethics. Ecojun aspires to make a meaningful contribution to the planet, where the next generation will live, by attracting attentions to eco-friendly products. Products made by ecojun company are not just content with eco-friendliness, but intend to reach out to customers with the best design and qualities considering both green design and user-friendliness.

name: CauseLabs
description: CauseLabs leverages web and mobile technologies and builds custom digital tools to positively impact people. For over ten years, CauseLabs has empowered great cause organizations to move successfully from idea to execution through strategic workshops, technology roadmaps, and full digital product development breakthroughs.

name: Madhava Sweeteners
description: In 1973, Madhava founder Bart Utley began selling honey out of the back of his van in Boulder, Colorado. More than 40 years later, the brand has blossomed beyond honey and sweeteners to a variety of delicious, naturally sweet products made from the most delectable, organic and non-GMO ingredients around.

name: O'Connells OBM
description: O’Connells OBM is a team of proactive chartered accountants and business advisers who, put simply, help their clients get what they want – whether that’s building a better business, better protecting their assets, achieving financial independence – the list can go on.

name: Charity Bank
description: Charity Bank is a simple savings and loans bank with a social purpose. It gives support and lends solely to charities and other social profit enterprises with a charitable purpose that are working to enrich and improve society, and it utilises the savings of people and organisations that support this mission.

name: Climate Advisers
description: Climate Advisers is a mission-driven policy and politics shop working to deliver a strong low-carbon economy. In the United States and around the world, the company creates and implements large-scale, cost-effective strategies to strengthen climate action and improve lives. The firm works with philanthropies, think tanks, advocacy groups, international institutions, companies and governments. On specific projects, Climate Advisers partners with its affiliate Catapult to add grassroots organizing and outreach capacity.

name: AguaClara LLC
description: AguaClara provides the design services and technical assistance to implement its one-of-a-kind, community-scale water treatment technologies. These technologies were invented at Cornell University, and represent the most affordable and energy-efficient options anywhere in the world. They are made from all locally available materials, simple to operate, and entirely powered by gravity.

name: Dang Foods LLC
description: Dang is a better-for-you snack company bringing unprecedented culinary delights from all around the globe. As a leading coconut chip brand, Dang is committed to using high- quality ingredients that are sustainably grown and harvested. Dang Foods’ products are distributed nationwide with the motto “Dang, that’s good!”.

name: GEXSI GmbH
description: GEXSI was recently certified as a B Corp! Please check back soon for more information.

name: MIO
description: MIO is a lifestyle and culture company that bridges the gap between business and sustainability through design. MIO designs, manufactures and retails innovative furnishings and accessories for life. MIO’s offerings include unconventional and highly innovative designs that transform residential and commercial interiors easily and on a budget. MIO’s products are sold online and through decoration and home improvement retailers worldwide.

name: Thinkbaby & Thinksport
description: Thinkbaby and Thinksport’s founder, Kevin Brodwick, brought his interest in health and preventative medicine, and his background in biotechnology together to form a company whose sole purpose is to create safe products for babies to athletes alike.

name: LimeRed Studio
description: LimeRed Studio is a creative services agency that works with organizations that inspire positive change. LimeRed Studio believes they play an important role in building a better web for everyone but more importantly, they strive to inspire, promote, and build tools for people, programs, and ideas that make people’s lives better.

name: Zevin Asset Management
description: Zevin Asset Management, LLC is a boutique global SRI/ESG asset manager based in Boston that uses a top-down economically driven approach to build institutional and individual portfolios. Although ZAM was established in 1997, the firm’s portfolio managers are pioneers of SRI with careers stretching back to the foundation of the movement.

name: Green Glass
description: Green Glass is all about saving the world one recycled bottle at a time. Bottles are collected from the trash, washed, and transformed into cool upcycled products as drinking glasses and wine glasses. Green Glass’s goal is to save as many bottles as possible, and spread the anti-garbage pro-recycling message all over the world.

name: Grupo GAIA
description: Gaia Group is a group of companies that operate in various sectors such as financial, real estate, educational, environmental, sports, and quality of life. Each company with its own segment shares the same principle: to act in areas which can make a difference, trying to delight people, innovate, and perform.

name: African Bronze Honey Company Inc
description: 10 years ago one person, Dan Ball, went into the forest in Zambia to help 2 dozen beekeepers market their honey. Today that same person has trained over 6,000 beekeepers and exports 800 tonnes of their honey into the EU. A little over a year ago Dan asked us to market that honey into North America, and that was the beginning of African Bronze Honey.

name: Roots for Sustainability
description: Roots for Sustainability (R4S) is a sustainable projects boosting organization that conceives, designs, analyzes, executes and monitors its flourishing initiatives with the most adequate partners for each occasion. R4S stands as an innovative agent for the creation of regenerative, profitable, global and endurable business actions.

name: Olomomo Nut Company, LLC.
description: OLOMOMO Nut Company launched in Boulder, Colorado in 2008 with a simple mission: be

name: PixelSpoke
description: PixelSpoke is a marketing agency that helps companies to connect with their customers using all the different "spokes" in the digital ecosystem, including websites, email, social media, mobile, and search engines. They focus on community financial institutions (credit unions & local banks), member-focused organizations, and businesses with social or environmental missions.

name: Rescue Social Change Group
description: Rescue SCG provides behavior change marketing services (or "social marketing") to government, non-profit and corporate organizations. Rescue SCG's current work focuses on tobacco, obesity, violence and alcohol prevention; the promotion of exercise, fresh foods and after school programs; and other products and services that promote healthy living. Most of Rescue SCG's behavior change campaigns focus on teens (13 - 17) and young adults (18 - 26), resulting in unrivaled experience in adolescent behavior change campaigns.

name: Picaroons
description: Located in Fredericton, New Brunswick, Canada, Picaroons Traditional Ales, brews traditional British-style ales using malted barley, hops, our signature Hampshire yeast and water.

name: Better Future
description: Better Future is a strategic consultancy that helps forward-thinking enterprises inspire, ignite and empower the dreams and passions of people and align them with the core 'why' of the organization to discover new business opportunities and reinvent the rules of the game. They take business out of the office and 'comfort zone' on customized journeys that start with personal and meaningful, and engage with new perspectives, places, and business models.

name: The School of Life Australia
description: The School of Life Australia addresses issues such as how to find fulfilling work, how to master the art of relationships, how to understand one's past, how to achieve calm and how better to understand and, where necessary change, the world. They are devoted to developing emotional intelligence through the help of culture via conversation, public classes, workshops and coffee!

name: Babyganics
description: Babyganics' mission is to design all the products parents need to create a baby-safe world where their babies are free to develop and thrive.

name: Five AM Life Pty Ltd
description: During one of his early morning moments of clarity, surfer and long-time yogi David Prior was inspired to create a product that would allow him to have a clear, ecological conscience. Thus was born five:am – a range of purely organic yoghurts and granolas. Over time, five:am has achieved their vision of taking organic yoghurt from a health food niche, into the mainstream, therefore making it more affordable and accessible for all.

name: Caravela Coffee
description: Caravela Coffee is a vertically integrated green coffee company with roots in Latin America, delivering excellence to coffee roasters throughout the globe.

name: ECO2LIBRIUM
description: ECO

name: Indosole, LLC
description: Indosole represents a lifestyle of resourceful creation. Each year, over one billion waste tires end up in landfills worldwide. Indosole is on a mission to salvage discarded tires and give them new life as soles for their footwear. So far, Indosole has prevented over 30,000 tires from ending up in landfills and have turned those tires into over 60,000 pair of shoes.

name: With Good Reasons, LLC
description: With Good Reasons, LLC is a small company dedicated to providing healthy, wholesome granolas and gluten-free snacks in a conscious way. It strives to protect the Earth, contribute to the local economy, and support social justice through its business practices. It's snacks and granolas are made in small batches to keep them fresh. They are made using whole foods, with less sweetener than most competing products and no chemical additives. With Good Reasons also uses fair-trade, local, and organic ingredients when available.

name: Green Mountain Power
description: Green Mountain Power is committed to their community and the environment, as they transform into Vermont’s Energy Company of the Future to provide their customers with energy efficient products and services to help them save money by using less energy.

name: Out Leadership
description: Out Leadership develops innovative and forward-thinking initiatives to leverage LGBT opportunities across a range of industries. Designed to engage senior leaders, Out Leadership’s global initiatives seek to impact business results, develop talent, and drive LGBT equality forward. These initiatives engage 51 member firms within three industry-specific verticals: Out on the Street, Out in Law, and Out in Insurance. Each vertical hosts cutting-edge programming for its industry and offers unique opportunities for cross-industry collaboration across Out Leadership broadly. In addition, Out Leadership has launched OutNEXT across its verticals as the first global emerging leadership organization focused on talent development for young LGBT leaders in the business sector.

name: McEvoy Ranch
description: Nan Tucker McEvoy did not set out to become a pioneer in the rebirth of California’s olive oil industry when she purchased a 550-acre ranch in the rolling hills of Marin County in 1990 – she simply wanted to provide her grandchildren with a chance to develop a meaningful connection to the land, but with Marin County’s strict zoning laws, Nan needed an agricultural purpose.

name: Quinn & Partners Inc.
description: Quinn & Partners is a management consulting firm specializing in corporate sustainability strategy and integration. Services include strategy design, implementation, auditing and reporting. Clients are well-known Canadian organizations in financial services, real estate, hospitality, retail, transportation and the not-for profit industries.

name: Food.Stories.Travel.
description: Food.Stories.Travel. grew out of their desire to combine twelve years of experience in travel and food with their passion for learning the stories of local foodmakers, and tasting and supporting their works. They organize travel, eating, learning, and connecting with local food producers who care about the environment, support the local community and believe in sustainable practices. Their journeys are led by professional Tour Leaders who help you to explore local foods, culture, traditions, and history, while sightseeing and walking for a healthy lifestyle.

name: Bluerise BV
description: Bluerise is a technology provider and project developer of Ocean Thermal Energy solutions. The thermal energy stored in the tropical ocean can be used to generate sustainable electricity, cooling, and fresh water. They specialize in OTEC (Ocean Thermal Energy Conversion), SWAC (Seawater Air Conditioning) technologies and related Deep Sea Water applications.

name: UNO500 (243INNOVA24H S.L.)
description: uno500 helps established companies to innovate like Start-Ups, using a structured innovation process to guide (and empower) employees from  ideas to creation to product launch.

name: Atelier 10
description: Atelier 10 est un projet multifacette qui a, au cœur de sa mission, la publication de textes originaux, soignés et susceptibles de nous permettre de mieux comprendre les enjeux de notre époque, de prendre part activement à la vie de notre société et de mener une vie plus signifiante et satisfaisante. Nous publions deux fois par année le magazine Nouveau Projet, de même que la collection d’essais Documents et la collection de textes dramatiques Pièces.

name: Raven + Lily
description: Raven + Lily is an ethical fashion and lifestyle brand dedicated to empowering women through design. This company develops long term partnerships with talented female artisans around the world to create their collections of apparel, gifts, and accessories. Raven + Lily is dedicated to fair trade and eco-friendly principles, striving to provide their customers with fashionable products that are good to the environment as well as the people that make them. Raven + Lily products can be purchased online, through one of their many retail partners, and at their flagship storefront in Austin, TX. By shopping with Raven + Lily, customers are given the opportunity to use their purchasing power to make a positive impact on the world.

name: Platinum Coaching Inc.
description: Platinum Coaching cultivates the skills of executives for the organizations they lead - diligently committed to the transformational evolution of effective and enduring leaders. The driving force behind their coaching philosophy is growth. They provide the tools to create constructive experiences which fuel personal development and translate to professional growth.

name: Parque del Recuerdo
description: Parque del Recuerdo is the first cemetery in Chile that utilizes a novel concept of landscaping in their services. Over the past 30 years, Parque del Recuerdo has helped families cope with the loss of a loved one. They are committed to provide professional support to those who need it. In the past five years, they have carried out the only existing study about Chilean culture and death. The results have been shared in the community, and they have addressed their strategies based on the needs of individuals, diversifying, for example rites and memorial services.

name: Shifting Patterns Consulting
description: Shifting Patterns facilitates social change by working alongside social enterprises to mobilize resources for addressing today’s most pressing challenges while developing the internal support systems needed for longer-term sustainability. Resource mobilization, institutional support, and partnership development services are tailored to the needs of each client. What separates Shifting Patterns from other consulting firms is their exclusive focus on changemakers, ability to establish working relationships grounded in trust and mutual respect, and a consulting model that strengthens organizational capacity through knowledge and skills transfer thereby reducing the need for external support.

name: Cambridge Naturals
description: Cambridge Naturals is a family-owned and operated community health store, founded in 1974 by Michael Kanter and Elizabeth Stagl. The business’ mission is to provide the best choices in nutritional supplements for health and wellness, clean body care products and organic foods. Cambridge Naturals is committed to sourcing products locally, organically, and ethically via fair trade and direct trade channels, and to donating a portion of profits to social and environmental organizations that impact their local community. Cambridge Naturals offers a wide assortment of high quality vitamins, herbs, body care, books and yoga supplies, along with a curated selection of organic, fairly traded, local and unique groceries, just for you!

name: MaCher USA
description: By Trade, MaCher custom designs and manufactures reusable gifts and premium packaging.

name: Pyramid Communications
description: Pyramid is a team of organizational, content, creative, digital, and engagement strategists working to deliver results for mission-driven organizations. They've been generating positive impact for their clients—and the world around them—for over 22 years. Building and telling stories that drive action is what they love to do every day. It’s as complex, and as simple as that.

name: Reformation
description: Reformation is a revolutionary lifestyle brand created in 2009 by designer Yael Aflalo. Based in Los Angeles, Reformation offers stylish eco-conscious garments, proving that fast fashion and sustainability can co-exist beautifully.

name: Image Relay
description: Image Relay has pioneered a cloud-based digital asset and brand management solution since 2002. With a highly scalable platform, organizations can centralize, manage, and distribute all their files with simplicity and speed.

name: SOURCE Local Foods
description: Building sustainable food systems, SOURCE Local Foods is a local food distribution hub in Colorado. Connecting farmers, ranchers and value-added artisan food manufacturers with restaurants, grocers, hoteliers, schools and institutions, SOURCE is a key link in the region’s commercial food system. SOURCE distributes natural and certified organic produce, meats, cheeses/dairy, grocery and beverage products.

name: Montagne Alternative
description: In 2005, one of the cofounders randomly discovered the hamlet of Commeire while he was on a ski trip and directly fell in love with the place. The nature was splendid, quiet and seemed to rule the small but sunny village. It was magic. However, many building were falling apart abandoned under tons of snow. Slowly a project emerged, and with the help of a friend, an adventure began. After nine years, they renovated six ancient barns, one of which became a beautiful restaurant. Their bet was to propose a new and different approach of hostelry, respectful of the environment and of the local population so every visitors could enjoy the magic of the place.

name: Newton Running
description: Newton Running was founded in 2007 with the mission to make the best running shoes in the world, and to be the best running shoe company for the world. The Newton mission statement is “we exist to make every stride better.” The employees at Newton all share a love for running, a desire to spread the running love, and an embodiment of the company’s core values: Excellence, Integrity, Fun, Passion, Valuing People, Social Responsibility and Resourcefulness.

name: Lucenza
description: Lucenza is a company with over 10 years experience. They offer a safe and efficient system designed according to the passenger and needs.

name: Productos Naturales Aral Thel S.A.
description: Aral Thel SA is a company that contributes to the welfare of society by developing herbal medicines. They are also committed to protecting the environment.

name: Kindred Studios
description: Kindred Studios is a fully equipped multi purpose facility and venue in Yarraville that offer specialized rehearsal and recording studios, a photography and video space, tutorial rooms, computer lab, and a brand new operational theatre featuring a state of the art Nexo rig with Industry standard front of house and fold back controls and a versatile lighting rig which is used primarily for Musicians to both develop their work and to present Musical Events.

name: Vital Choice
description: Since 2002 Vital Choice has been a trusted source for fast home delivery of the world's finest wild seafood and organic fare. Products are sourced from healthy, well-managed wild fisheries and farms, backed with great customer service, and a 100% satisfaction guarantee.

name: Xinca
description: Xinca generates work for people who are in a state of social vulnerability through shoemaking, while respecting their commitment to sustainability and the environment. Their products are produced from recycled materials.

name: Our Community Pty Ltd
description: Our Community was recently certified as a B Corp! Please check back soon for more information.

name: Solarus Sunpower Sweden AB
description: Solarus was founded in 2006 and is a technology spin-off out of the leading Nordic energy company Vattenfall. Together with a select group of research institutions Solarus has developed a third generation hybrid solar energy system. This system is unique in the world due to its extraordinary combined performance in electricity and heat production. Besides that the system rates very high in CO2 reduction.

name: Natura
description: Since its foundation in 1969, Natura has been driven by its passion for cosmetics, relationships,the ongoing promotion of well being, and sustainable development. The business is based on a direct selling model, which currently involves more than 1.6 million Natura consultants (NCs) in Brazil and in its international operations.

name: Little Genius International
description: Little Genius International® was Founded in 2005, by husband and wife Ruhma Y. Rinaldi (educator and expert in sustainable development and medical sociology) and Nicola Christian Rinaldi (sustainable innovation and ICT expert).

name: La 25
description: La 25 works every day in search of the best way to change lives through football and in turn, transform and improve the actions of Colombian soccer.

name: The Cleaver Co.
description: Founded in 1981, The Cleaver Co. has long been committed to supporting a regional food and farm economy that fosters a pure food supply. The Cleaver Co. is a full-service event planning and catering operation with a large roster of private, non-profit and corporate clients. The Green Table is their farm-to-table restaurant in the Chelsea Market where guests enjoy delicious, globally-inspired dishes that demonstrate a commitment to seasonal cuisine. The company also operates two food and beverage kiosks in the Bosque Gardens at The Battery in Lower Manhattan.

name: Super Humane
description: Super Humane builds software that improves the human condition. They focus primarily on mobile web and leading edge technologies leveraging a process that values—pre-eminently—empathy for real users. They create tools and apps that help people find jobs and education, teach them about the world around them, entertain them, and make their lives easier.

name: Nature Services Peru
description: Nature Services Peru is a company that develops inclusive businesses based on the products and services supplied by nature and provides natural resources management consulting services, with the objective of strengthening the comprehensive management of ecosystems in Peru.

name: ADDvocacy ADHD & Life Skills Coaching ltd
description: ADDvocacy ADHD & Life Skills Coaching is committed to supporting students and other adults with ADHD achieve their full personal, educational and professional potential.

name: OBA SAS
description: OBA creates educational trips that empower, challenge, and inspire students to become better citizens of the world.

name: Kickstarter Inc.
description: Kickstarter is the world’s largest funding community for creative projects — everything from films, games, restaurants, and music to art, design, and technology. Kickstarter is full of ambitious, innovative, and imaginative projects that are brought to life through the direct support of others. Since its launch in 2009, 7.5 million people have pledged $1.5 billion, funding more than 75,000 creative projects. Kickstarter is an independent company of about 100 people located in Brooklyn.

name: EdOps
description: EdOps is focused on providing high-value business management services to charter schools and education non-profits. EdOps assists charter schools with a range of services including finance & accounting, student data management, human resources, and charter school start-up.

name: Wallaroo Hat Company
description: Wallaroo Hat Company, based in Boulder, Colorado, was founded in 1999 by Stephanie Carter and Lenya Shore. Wallaroo prides itself on being a leader in the fashion forward, sun protective hat industry, combining the latest fabrics and designs with maximum sun protection. Many of the hats in the Wallaroo Collection are rated UPF 50+ ensuring that the customer gets a 97.5% UV block from the sun’s harmful rays. With the incidence of skin cancer on the rise nationally, sun protection is more important now than ever before. Wallaroo is actively involved with the Skin Cancer Foundation and many Wallaroo hats are recommended as an effective UV protectant.

name: Alfa Accountants en Adviseurs
description: Alfa Accountants en Adviseurs is a Dutch based accounting firm with a rich history. The company was founded in 1942 during WWII. Alfa has since grown into a solid company with more than 800 professionals working from 27 offices across the Netherlands.

name: DeConi
description: DeConi is a strategic marketing consultancy based in Sofia, Bulgaria. Empowered by its clients with trust and marketing resources the agency turns them into competitive advantages for their brands and products.

name: Energy for the People
description: Energy for the People (EFTP) provides independent energy services, focused on designing and delivering integrated clean energy solutions, such as solar power, energy efficiency, energy storage and smart energy management, including micro-grid and off-grid precincts.
